meanings.definition: An area of high or hilly land.
meanings.sent1: The sheep grazed peacefully on the uplands.
meanings.sent2: Hiking in the uplands offers stunning views of the surrounding valleys.
meanings.sent3: The uplands seemed to be playing hide and seek with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: The uplands stood tall like ancient guardians of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The uplands were like a crown atop the rolling hills.

meanings.sent1: Farmers in the uplands grow crops that thrive in cooler climates.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the uplands can reveal hidden streams and waterfalls.
meanings.sent3: The uplands whispered secrets to the curious travelers.
meanings.sent4: The uplands were a fortress of nature, protecting the valley below.
meanings.sent5: The uplands painted a picture of tranquility under the vast sky.
